entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Address the TimeProvider community feedback #84274
    8.0.0
  • Alt-Svc and Authentication header value parsers throw from TryParse #84269
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: X509KeysStorageFlags.IgnorePrivateKeys #84267
  • [API Proposal]: Paraller For and Paraller Foreach #84266
  • Warn when comparing spans to null #84265
  • Investigate microbenchmarks that regress with PGO enabled #84264
  • Standardize way to add OAuth tokens via IHttpClientBuilder #84263
  • The first character of the line is not written in Console.Write or WriteLine if Esc was pressed #84261
  • JSON source generator can't serialize IAsyncEnumerable #84260
  • Consider path forward for {RSA, DSA}CryptoServiceProvider #84259
  • CA1416 False positive for flag enum values with bitwise operator or HasFlag. #84258
  • [mono][linux][x64] Native crash: waitpd.c no such file or directory #84257
  • Type.IsValueType returns true for type parameter constrained to Enum #84256
  • [mono][tests] Enhance iOS runtime tests coverage #84254
    8.0.0
  • Incorrect comparison of cyrillic words [net6] #84251
    Future
  • Redundant nullcheck in ARR_LEN/IND on top of non-null array #84248
  • System.Configuration.TypeUtil.GetImplicitType #84244
  • [API Proposal]: Hope Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Json package supports Saving modified configuration to external json file. #84240
    Future
  • Test failure Tests.System.TimeProviderTests.TestProviderTimer #84236
    8.0.0

Closed

  • .NET runtime cannot be found when executing dotnet-aspnet-codegenerator #84262
  • Integer.TryParse with Nothing object #81225
  • Build: generate layout does not copy runtime libraries #70096
    Future
  • Test merged baseservices/threading time out in gcstress #83961
    8.0.0
  • Valgrind support on .NET 7 #76986
  • StripSymbols doesn't seem to work on 7.0.102 arm64 Raspbian OS #80499
  • NativeAOT support for TypeIdentifier #79941
  • IsSuccessStatusCode does not work #84243
  • Null Checks in NativeAOT? #84239

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Implement the ENDFINALLY opcode in the jiterpreter #84273
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Suppress linker warnings properly #84272
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Derived Interface support in ComInterfaceGenerator #84271
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Fix debugger stack unwind AV #84270
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add issues.targets entry for known issue #84007 #84268
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [test] Try to get more details from hanging build #84253
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix gtMarkAddrMode assert #84252
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow ResolveReadyToRunCompilers to be run under FreeBSD #84250
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [browser][non-icu] HybridGlobalization compare #84249
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [mono] fix two call get_default_jit_mm make hotreload work in non default alc #84247
    area-EnC-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Adding Vector128.Dot as intrinsic for arm64. #84245
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][sgen] Remove old code associated with domain unload #84242
    area-GC-mono
  • Introducing Time abstraction Part2 (down-level support) #84235
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Refactor `Interop.LocalAlloc` follow-up #84164
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Prepare ComInterfaceGenerator for going into the public API #83894
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Enable daily perf runs on cloud VMs #84203
    area-Infrastructure
  • Split Rank1 MdArray allocation into a separate helper #84205
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete `GTF_BLK_VOLATILE` and `GTF_BLK_UNALIGNED` #84217
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `LCL_VAR_ADDR` #84185
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] update sgen codeowners #84255
    area-Meta
  • [RISC-V] Port Mono for RISC-V 64 Arch (1/3) lp64d ABI #83714
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Don't publish the aot-instances.dll assembly, its not needed a… #84214
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Remove the support for non r4fp, its not used by any supported platforms. #82005
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Re-enable null check optimization for mid-method traces #84058
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Stop excluding existing files from CORE_ROOT generation #84195
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2149555 #84102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][llvm] Add a fastpath to calling mini_init_method_rgctx (). #84226
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [mono] Futher cleanups to delegate invocation #83705
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use timeouts in 2 socket test cases #84030
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Add constprop handling for `typeof(T) == typeof(Foo)` #84224
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove redundant settings #83041
    community-contribution
  • Update usage of AllowEmptyTelemetry based on changes to the task in the SDK #82804
  • [release/7.0] Ensure free buffer space when reading TLS messages #83574
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.6

Updated

  • Add switch: Do not resolve URLs by defaults for XML #84169
    area-System.Xml, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] SyntaxValueProvider: avoid performance issue with syntax list containing many items #83742
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 6.0.17
  • NativeAOT: Partially expand static initialization #83911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Build on CBL-mariner host with rootfs #84148
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [JIT] ARM64/X64 - Add `IsVNNeverNegative` #83694
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change the stresslog message layout to support extra-large modules and modules loaded at far-apart addresses that use the stresslog #83855
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Properly allocate shadow space for block op helpers on win-x64 #84124
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce a diagnostic switch to turn off the use of file mapping in PE loader. #84151
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Don't overwrite pinned assembly versions in servicing #84079
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Switch mono to use cmake-detected objcopy #83903
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Fix re-use val zero on GC tracking #84051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix reflection invoke file format issue for generic methods #83438
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] X86/X64 - Eliminate redundant 'cmp' instructions #82750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduction to vectorization with Vector128 and Vector256 #84115
    area-Meta
  • Delete `GT_OBJ` #84221
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Investigating timeout on debugger tests on CI #84080
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Make WindowsServiceLifetime gracefully stop #83892
    area-System.ServiceProcess
  • Avoid allocations when adding existing items to the blob heap. #81059
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [NO MERGE][wasm-threads] JSImport promises on background threads #83838
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Cleanup unmaintainable parallel logic with workers #77993
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Reduce contention for Datacontract Serialization #73893
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Optimize stackalloc zeroing via BLK #83255
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve XmlDictionaryWriter UTF8 encoding performance #73336
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Use 1MB fallback stack when procfs fails #83271
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add exceptions to TAR extended attribute constructors to disallow '=' and '\n' characters in keys and values. #82812
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [RISC-V] Port Mono for RISC-V 64 Arch (2/3) thunk & tramponlie #83715
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Correctly display the GCSettings specified in the runtimeconfig json via the GC Configuration API Call #84201
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Make host look for RID-specific assets via a known list by default #84100
    breaking-change, area-Host, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Change `callvirt` into `calli` for virtual delegates #83461
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [Mono] Support get_Count and get_AllBitsSet for mini JIT on Arm64 #84180
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][jit] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods on WASM. #82981
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Simplify numasupport #84207
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add PipeOptions.FirstPipeInstance enum value #83936
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Always create loop pre headers #83956
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add NuGet-Migrations workaround to runtime tests too #84129
    needs-area-label
  • Testmerging jit64 #83151
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support nocheck prefix #81615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Use underlying type converter for nullable type #84208
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Use Vector128 and Vector256 in interface cast #83000
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Port Mono for RISC-V 64 Arch (3/3) IL Lowering & Outputting #83716
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` change case #84019
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Implement the JsonSerializer.IsReflectionEnabledByDefault feature switch #83844
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Eliminate bound checks for "arr[index % arr.Length]" #84231
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `gtGetStructHandle` and friends #84212
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #84082
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Start dynamic heap count work #84168
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Static cctor analysis for reflection #84089
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update System.CommandLine version #84229
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add CollectionsMarshal.SetCount(list, count) #82146
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Vectorize Enumerable.Range(...).ToArray() #80633
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [Mono]: Library mode enhancements. #84165
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Performance improvements for Random.Shuffle() #83305
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Annotate Microsoft.CSharp library code for DynamicCode #82747
    area-Microsoft.CSharp, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Private API for RefreshMemoryLimit #83707
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve IndexOfAnyValues throughput for needles with 0 #84184
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Async state machines don't need Equals/GetHashCode implementations #618

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM : merge broke the package publishing #2242

PullRequests

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM Set buildConfig from debugOnPrReleaseOnRolling as per runtime #2244

Updated

  • Add MstatDump to runtimelab #2238

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to download https://dotnetcli.azureedge.net/dotnet/Sdk/6.0.407/dotnet-dev-win-x64.6.0.407.zip #31580
  • DependencyContext.Default.RuntimeLibraries returning ".Reference" libraries after updating to VS 17.5.3 #31582

Closed

  • GenAPI filters out generic interfaces for implementations #31484
  • Semicolons removed from TestRunParameters.Parameter value #31569

PullRequests

Created

  • Infer analyzer settings from EnableAotAnalyzer #31590
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Allow ResolveReadyToRunCompilers to be run under FreeBSD #31581
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • check derived/generated symbols #31579
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.11.2 to 19.12.0 in /eng/dependabot #31577
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.11.2 to 19.12.0 in /eng/dependabot #31576
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Add support for `DOTNET_WATCH_AUTO_RELOAD_WS_ENDPOINT` to `dotnet watch` #31575
    untriaged

Merged

  • Add Microsoft.NET.Sdk.WebAssembly.Tasks to source-build.slnf #31588
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • First pass at source build pre-built detection #31341
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2149757 #31526
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • changes to containers tests and `ComputeDotnetBaseImageTag` #31541
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • GenAPI should not filter out base generic interfaces. #31545
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI
  • Add missing dependency for strict coherency compatibility #31584
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Move asset compression to the StaticWebAssets SDK #31559
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Adding locked messages as there is overlocalization in at least 5 of … #31421
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • extend search table with trusted and owners info #31403
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31511
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Blazor hosted #30908
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #31519
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Possible bug related to `UnscopedRef` introduced in 7.1.200 #67626
  • Completions in VB method declaration interfere with smart break line #67624
  • `IAwaitOperation.Type` shouldn't be void for VB when await is bound as statement #67616
  • EditorBrowsable(EditorBrowsableState.Never) does not work on parameterized property #67615
    Backlog

Closed

  • Lightbulb performance improvements #66968
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix main-vs-deps merge overwriting merge from 17.6-vs-deps #67629
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove excessive allocations of SourceLocations with mergedecls #67627
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Always include syntactic classifications in semantic response #67625
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update publishdata for 17.6 after snap #67628
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid having to reread files from secondary storage just to get their version information #67603
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Async lightbulb performance improvement #66970
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use OneOrMany in the node->BoundNode map #67606
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge 17.7-vs-deps back into 17.7 #67618
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge main-vs-deps back into main #67617
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #67620
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Update publishdata for -vs-deps deletion #67623
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to release/dev17.7 #67619
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to release/dev17.7 #67609
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Port #67597 to main #67614
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Interceptors #67432
    Area-Compilers
  • Switch semantic model to use `OneOrMany` instead of ImmutableArray for hot paths that often return a single value. #67587
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move off of the final usage of an uncached AsyncLazy #65780
    Area-IDE
  • Handle assignments in patterns #67517
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Work to unify threading concepts between Workspace and ProjectSystemProjectFactory (part1) #67522
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce the number of Location objects created during binding #67601
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • State machine and lambda EnC analysis fixes and simplification #67608
    Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • [Lightbulb Perf] AnalyzerDriver performance improvements #67591
    Area-Analyzers, Tenet-Performance, untriaged
  • Allow nested instance member access in `nameof` in static context #67461
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [17.6] Check count before reusing cached items in `BatchNode` #66992
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Adjust comment for CompilerAnalyzerThrows in resx file #67589
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Round-trip extensions via metadata #67530
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Stop Calling JSON GetTypeInfo with the runtime type #47548
  • Hosting bundle still restarts on Repair and Uninstall when /norestart is passed #47544
    Infrastructure
  • Allow inheriting from a base page without requiring `base.BuildRenderTree(__builder)` #47538
  • ASP.NET Core metrics #47536

Closed

  • Components-e2e pipeline failing #47546
  • In Blazor's EditContext class, why is there no MarkAsModified method? #47497
  • Blazor United: Auto Generate API Layer and Frontend actions, so that a single component can work in both server and client render modes #47529
  • QuickGrid responsive table support #47294
  • Replace QueryStringEnumerable.SpanHelper with MemoryExtensions.Replace #47457
  • why fetch api can't get valid response when asp.net core return 401 status #47425

PullRequests

Created

  • Sanitize 0x7F in Content-Disposition filename #47549
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Pass /norestart to Hosting Bundle nested bundles #47545
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Pass /norestart to Hosting Bundle nested bundles #47543
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Update SDK; use ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIfEqual instead of n… #47540
    area-signalr
  • Extend ControllerBase.Problem that can add extensions to ProblemDetails #47539
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Update servicing milestones for May #47541
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • Pass /norestart to Hosting Bundle nested bundles #47542
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • Don't test for hard-coded ages in QuickGrid tests #47547
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0-preview4
  • Tweak RunHelix.ps1 to work on DevBox #47524
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • Replace SpanHelper.ReplacePlusWithSpace #47506
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Support zlib or raw deflate compression with 'deflate' content-coding #47522
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `2d4f208` to `b5fd99b` #47528
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `2d4f208` to `b5fd99b` #47527
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Add metrics to hosting and Kestrel #46834
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • FRC - how to monitor metrics created by the default MetricFactory? #3796

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] Use the KeyboardScrollingManager to keep view on screen on rotation #14372
    Backlog
  • [MacCatalyst] [iOS] Label goes out of the bounds of its parent when it has a bigger desired width than the parent constraints #14368
  • [Android] Picker dialog button layout direction #14367
  • iOS simulators arnt listed and physical device fails to deploy #14366
  • Can't change Shell's ForegroundColor when using a custom renderer #14365
  • CollectionView on Android does not provide height, width, logical children once loaded, works fine on Windows #14364
    Backlog
  • CollectionView doesn't update the item size when content in ItemTemplate is resized #14363
    Backlog
  • [Android] CollectionView has binding issue during scrolling #14360
    Backlog
  • Event after ContentPage is assigned to Window.Page #14359
    Backlog
  • I tried to change picker title color in maui. but i can see still it's white color. #14358

Closed

  • RadioButton preselection in xaml with multiple RadioButtonGroups not working #6227
    Backlog
  • Build Action: BundleResource does not exist. #7938
  • Canvas does not work AT ALL outside of constructor #8142
  • Display issues on MacCatalyst when multiple shell content is present inside a tab #12479
    Backlog
  • Toggle button OnColor for Off state not working in iOS, also VisualStateManager is also not working. #10099
    Backlog
  • iOS - CollectionView inside of RefreshView does not size correctly #7315
    .NET 7 Planning
  • UICollectionView is stuck in its update/layout loop #12188
    Backlog
  • [iOS] CollectionView inside RefreshView freezes app completely #11363
    Backlog
  • Incorrect layout with RefreshView, CollectionView that has an GridItemsLayout on iPhone #11327
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Custom handler freezes VS #14172
  • [iOS] Appshell tabs not appearing on iOS after screen rotation #13621
    Backlog
  • A lot of refreshes will get slower and slower #14204
  • AppThemeBinding doesn't work on iOS in runtime #8606
  • Auto theme change doesn't behave as expected on .NET 7 whereas the same works fine on .NET 6 #11299
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix incorrect caching of unconstrained measures #14373
    area/layout 🔲
  • Adding ContentInsets to iOS Keyboard Scrolling #14371
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix Shell TitleView rendering issues on iOS 16 (#1283… #14370
    area/shell 🐢
  • [net7.0] Fix edge case with Grids, *s, and unconstrained layouts #14369
    area/layout 🔲
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix clipping issues with some views #14362
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [macOS] Display alert by Window #14361
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, backport/suggested

Merged

  • Add top safe area when top tabs are present #14328
    area/shell 🐢
  • Refactor keyboard focus code for .NET 8 #13824
    area/controls 🎮
  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • [iOS] Make sure to update the frame of the RefreshView content #14302
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview, backport/suggested
  • Don't update the top tabs frame inside the safe area changed #14330
    area/shell 🐢

Updated

  • [net7.0] Make MAUI into a workload based on NuGet packs #14331
    area/setup 🪄
  • Removal of the AppAction icon extension on Android #14235
  • [Android] Allow to override WebViewClient on Android WebView #14321
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Moves Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Gtk into the Maui repo #9522
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, .NET 8 Planning
  • [WIP] Add first draft color test #14180
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • Fix menu item command binding (#13848) #14345
    community ✨
  • Updated Templates for Blazor apps for MacCatalyst #14196
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Remove HandlerImpl folder and put partial files together #14339
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Replace Shell sans-serif-medium magic string on Android #13544
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/fonts 🅰️
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix CollectionView EmptyView #11763
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Windows] Apply different brushes by state (Normal, PointerOver, etc) #10782
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Use Background as Fill, if Fill is null in Shapes #14216
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Windows] Fix crash swapping MainPage #14262
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭
  • [Android] Changes to propagate touch event with Frame #14230
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Having a default value in an explicit many-to-many join table breaks updates #30614
  • How to change the type of a single entity in a one-to-many collection? #30611
  • Make `SequentialGuidValueGenerator` non-allocating #30610
  • How to perform UPDATE query with multiple conditions? #30609

Closed

  • Mapping an enum to an integer breaks JSON data #30598

PullRequests

Created

  • [SMALL/TEST ONLY] Small fix to JSON update tests #30616
    auto-merge
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30330 - Json: updating property with conversion from string to other type fails on sql server #30615
    Servicing-consider
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.32.2 to 3.32.3 #30613
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient from 5.1.0 to 5.1.1 #30612
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Update SDK #30608

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Fix for #30266 and #30565 - projecting json entity/reference as well as regular entity collection #30600
    Servicing-consider
  • Add NativeAOT support for Change Tracking #30256

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

PullRequests

Merged

  • Enable per-repo-PVP for diagnostics #15968
